string-array.name: q12
string-array.item: Late, by myself, in the boat by myself,
no light and no land anywhere,
cloudcover thick. I try to stay
just above the surface, yet I\'m already under
and living within the ocean.

string-array.name: q77
string-array.item: For years, copying other people, I tried to know myself.
From within, I couldn\'t decide what to do.
Unable to see, I heard my name being called.
Then I walked outside.

string-array.name: q116
string-array.item: Take someone who doesn\'t keep score,
who\'s not looking to be richer, or afraid of losing,
who has not the slightest interest even
in his own personality: He\'s free.

string-array.name: q494
string-array.item: Someone who goes with half a loaf of bread
to a small place that fits like a nest around him,
someone who wants no more, who\'s not himself
longed for by anyone else,
He is a letter to everyone. You open it.
It says, Live.

string-array.name: q549
string-array.item: We take long trips.
We puzzle over the meaning of a painting or a book,
when what we\'re wanting to see and understand
in this world, we are that.

string-array.name: quatrain_numbers
string-array.item: Quatrain 12
Quatrain 77
Quatrain 116
Quatrain 494
Quatrain 549
